script.name: 系统信息检查
script.description: 检查系统基本信息，包括CPU、内存、磁盘等
script.content:
#!/bin/bash
echo "系统信息检查"
echo "==============="
echo "主机名: $(hostname)"
echo "系统: $(uname -a)"
echo ""
echo "内存使用情况:"
free -h
echo ""
echo "磁盘使用情况:"
df -h

script.description: 在指定目录查找大于指定大小的文件

script.name: 批量重命名文件
script.description: 将指定目录下的文件批量重命名，添加前缀或后缀
script.content:
#!/bin/bash
echo "批量重命名 ${directory} 目录下的 ${extension} 文件"
echo "添加前缀: ${prefix}"
cd ${directory}
for file in *.${extension}; do
  if [ -f "$file" ]; then
    mv "$file" "${prefix}$file"
    echo "重命名: $file -> ${prefix}$file"
  fi
done
echo "重命名完成！"

script.name: Docker 容器清理
script.description: 清理停止的容器和未使用的镜像
script.content:
#!/bin/bash
echo "清理 Docker 资源..."
echo ""
echo "停止的容器:"
docker ps -a --filter "status=exited" --format "{{.ID}} {{.Names}}"
echo ""
read -p "是否删除这些容器? (y/n) " -n 1 -r
echo
if [[ $REPLY =~ ^[Yy]$ ]]; then
  docker container prune -f
  echo "容器已清理"
fi
echo ""
echo "未使用的镜像:"
docker images --filter "dangling=true" --format "{{.ID}} {{.Repository}}:{{.Tag}}"
echo ""
read -p "是否删除这些镜像? (y/n) " -n 1 -r
echo
if [[ $REPLY =~ ^[Yy]$ ]]; then
  docker image prune -f
  echo "镜像已清理"
fi
echo ""
echo "清理完成！"

script.name: 数据库备份
script.description: 备份 MySQL 数据库到指定文件
script.content:
#!/bin/bash
TIMESTAMP=$(date +%Y%m%d_%H%M%S)
BACKUP_FILE="${backup_dir}/${database}_${TIMESTAMP}.sql"

echo "开始备份数据库: ${database}"
echo "备份文件: $BACKUP_FILE"

mysqldump -h ${host} -P ${port} -u ${username} -p${password} ${database} > $BACKUP_FILE

if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then
  echo "✅ 备份成功！"
  echo "文件大小: $(du -h $BACKUP_FILE | cut -f1)"
else
  echo "❌ 备份失败！"
  exit 1
fi
